sourcesContent:
const work = [
    {
      name: 'Sanxin Technology, Inc.',
      position: 'Full stack development Intern',
      companyProfile:"A tech company empowers local businesses to embrace the digital age, offering innovative solutions for digital and financial transformation. We pave the way for a seamless transition into smarter operations, enhanced online presence, and robust financial strategies, ensuring they thrive in today's fast-paced digital economy.",
      location: 'Yunnan, China',
      startDate: '2022-01-01',
      endDate: '2022-01-01',
      summary: [
        'Designed and developed websites visualizing planting procedure with modules of plant search, user management, authentication and admin using Node and Express; containerized the microservices with Docker in Kubernetes.',
        'Design and implemented efficient data model and operations using MySQL , optimized the database design with CQRS to improve the processing time of data query.',
        'Designed REST APIs handling HTTP requests for Elastic Search Engine to effectively serve data dynamic inputs from xx users, increasing the latency of query speed.',
        'Enhanced the web application’s 2Auth by implementing an SMS one-time-password authentication with JWT.',
        'Created the dynamic fronted pages with re-usable components using React, Next JS, and JavaScript, using jQuery to respond to users’ events and MongoDB for user management.',
        'Built a CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions to automate the testing process. Created unit tests with Jest and Supertest. Performed end-to-end usability tests on concurrency control mechanisms using JMeter.'
      ],
      techStack: [
        'MySql', 'Node', 'Express', 'CI/CD'
      ],
    },
    {
      name: 'New York Bamboo Consulting	 ',
      position: 'Strategic Marketing Consultant	  (Volunteer)',
      companyProfile:"A specialize in bridging opportunities, dedicated to helping Chinese international students secure promising job positions in the USA, navigating the complexities of cross-cultural employment with expertise and personalized support.",
      location: 'Remote',
      startDate: '2021-03-01',
      endDate: '2021-11-01',
      summary: [
        'Performed marketing research, competitors’ analysis, and content development design for the career development training platforms to raise reputation and awareness in the Asian and international students’ community ',
        'Organized and analyzed the data of existing media content, designed metrics to evaluate the success of the platform; provided statistical reports of historical patterns; conducted experiments to show different content and analyzed the views/comments/likes; provided social media marketing strategies, and increased the platform followers by 100% ',
        'Optimized the standard operating procedures for media content release and client interaction process, prepared slides for marketing materials, and updated the best practice documents to reflect the most recent changes in the training programs',
        'Coached junior interns to perform tasks for quality control, reviewed the content for the brand alignment, created dashboards for business development opportunities, and facilitated conversations with leadership effectively'
      ],
      techStack: [
        'MySql', 'Node', 'Express', 'CI/CD'
      ],
    }
];

export default work;
